title: Ep. 135: Plan a Virtual Move, 2.0
description:
Plan a virtual move 2.0, the satisfaction of finding the perfect solution to even a small problem, and a
brief conversation with writer Ann Brashares, who made a listener very happy. Get in touch: @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin.com; happiercast.com/135; 774-277-9336.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
